title._content: [Captain Ferdinand F. Boltz of Co. S, 12th Indiana Infantry Regiment, and Co. F, 88th Indiana Infantry Regiment and Siddie Boltz]  (LOC)

description._content: [Captain Ferdinand F. Boltz of Co. S, 12th Indiana Infantry Regiment, and Co. F, 88th Indiana Infantry Regiment and Siddie Boltz] [between 1861 and 1865] 2 photographs : ninth-plate ambrotypes, hand colored ; 7.5 x 6.4 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Thermoplastic; geometric and floral design. Notation on first manuscript: Capt. Boltz, "Uncle Ferd." Notation on second manuscript: Mrs. Boltz, "Aunt Siddie." Siddie was probably a nickname for Cornelia A. Boltz, née Sowers, wife of Ferdinand Boltz. Use digital images. Original served only by appointment because material requires special handling. For more information see: (www.loc.gov/rr/print/info/617_apptonly.html) Photo shows identified soldier and woman. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2012; (D066) Purchased from: Ben L. Pauley, Soldiercollectibles.com, 2012. Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Forms part of: Ambrotype/Tintype photograph filing series (Library of Congress). Subjects: Boltz, Ferdinand F.,--1839-1926. Boltz, Cornelia A.,--1841-1915. United States of America.--Army.--Indiana Infantry Regiment, 12th (1861-1865)--People. United States of America.--Army.--Indiana Infantry Regiment, 88th (1862-1865)--People. Soldiers--Union--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Union--1860-1870. Women--1860-1870. Couples--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Union. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Ambrotypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.33452 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2985
